AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:variable name='AccountsDB' select = "'010000001015163275644228600151'"/><xsl:template match="/"><DB><xsl:for-each select = "Root/Record[Size ='M' and not (preceding:: counter = counter)]"><POS><xsl:attribute name="Action"></xsl:attribute><xsl:attribute name="RollBackOnError"></xsl:attribute><xsl:attribute name="recordNumber"></xsl:attribute><purchase_order_id><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute></purchase_order_id><itemnumber><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute><xsl:value-of select="Style"/></itemnumber><name><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute><xsl:value-of select="Fabric_code"/></name><quantity><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute><xsl:value-of select="Size"/></quantity><price><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute><xsl:value-of select="globalMethod:DBQuery($varConn,$_class,$_identifier,$_subject,'SELECT purchase_order_id FROM POS',$AccountsDB,'false')" xmlns:globalMethod="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor"/></price><tax><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute></tax><paymenttype><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute></paymenttype><details><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute></details><shipdate><xsl:attribute name="isNull"></xsl:attribute></shipdate></POS></xsl:for-each></DB><xsl:result-document href="{$_repositoryPath}/output_2"><Root><xsl:for-each select = "Root/Record[Size ='M' and not (preceding:: counter = counter)]"><Record><xsl:attribute name="recordNumber"><xsl:value-of select="./@recordNumber"/></xsl:attribute><counter><xsl:value-of select="counter"/></counter><Style><xsl:value-of select="Style"/></Style><Fabric_code><xsl:value-of select="Fabric_code"/></Fabric_code><color_code><xsl:value-of select="color_code"/></color_code><UPC><xsl:value-of select="UPC"/></UPC><Description><xsl:value-of select="Description"/></Description><Size><xsl:value-of select="Size"/></Size><Color_description><xsl:value-of select="Color_description"/></Color_description><Fabric_content><xsl:value-of select="Fabric_content"/></Fabric_content><qty><xsl:value-of select="qty"/></qty><price><xsl:value-of select="price"/></price></Record></xsl:for-each></Root></xsl:result-document><xsl:value-of select="globalmethod:processMultipleTargetSaxon($_class,$_repositoryPath,'output_2')" xmlns:globalmethod= "java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MultipleTargetSaxon" /></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
